title: Best of The Herd for Feb 24, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Feb 24, 2020
description:
Colin talks about LeBron being the leader of the Lakers despite Anthony Davis potentially being more talented. He thinks the Packers should absolutely take a QB in the 1st round even if it bothers Aaron Rodgers. He points out how Tyson Fury leaned into his unique physical stature and that's what special athletes should do. Plus, former NFL WR T. J. Houshmandzadeh talks about working with several of the young QBs in the upcoming draft including Joe Burrow and which one is the biggest surprise pick.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
